about_the_game:
Bringing the magnificent, high-quality sound with a sense of harmony to your game.

The main theme, combat, tutorial, config screen, and various other events are unified with the atmosphere of samurai, warriors, and the Warring States period in Japan and China. OGG and M4A with looping tags are immediately available in the tool.

***************************

OGG files: 14

M4A files: 14

***************************

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.

・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker

・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.

The main theme, combat, tutorial, config screen, and various other events are unified with the atmosphere of samurai, warriors, and the Warring States period in Japan and China. OGG and M4A with looping tags are immediately available in the tool.
